parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To raise up, set up; I rise from among (the) dead; I arise, appear. From ana and histemi; to stand up.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Friendly; subst: a friend, an associate. Properly, dear, i.e. A friend; actively, fond, i.e. Friendly.
A primary particle of emphasis or qualification.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From a compound of a (compare aneu) and aidos; impudence, i.e. importunity.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I wake, arouse, (b) I raise up. Probably akin to the base of agora; to waken, i.e. Rouse.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Neuter Plural
str2: How much, how great, how many, as great as, as much. By reduplication from hos; as As.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To need, have need of, want, desire. From chreia; to make necessity, i.e. Be in want of.
